plot: A concert pianist lived his life only for his supportive wife and when she dies suddenly, he is crushed. His grief is so great that it reaches a point where he comes to hate his children and he makes up his mind to desert them.
title: Seulpeumeun naegeman
plot_es: A concert pianist lived his life only for his supportive wife and when she dies suddenly, he is crushed. His grief is so great that it reaches a point where he comes to hate his children and he makes up his mind to desert them.
plot_en: A concert pianist lived his life only for his supportive wife and when she dies suddenly, he is crushed. His grief is so great that it reaches a point where he comes to hate his children and he makes up his mind to desert them.
